titleStmt.title: Londons lotterie with an incouragement to the furtherance thereof for the good of Virginia, and the benefite of this our natiue countrie, wishing good fortune to all that venture in the same[.] To the tune of Lusty Gallant.

publicationStmt.publisher: by W. W[hite]. for Henry Robards, and are to be sold at his shop neere to S[. Dunstons] Church without Aldgate,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, printed side by side; the second part has title: The second part of Londons lotterie. To the tune of Lusty Gallant.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.

place.placeName: his shop neere to S[. Dunstons] Church without Aldgate
